categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Majzon was a male pureblood Sith who was a Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Galactic War he resided on the Vaiken Spacedock.
Lord Majzon was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic with the Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion as Imperial-side vendor for Galactic Command system.
